Controls/EditAtPlace.name: Controls/EditAtPlace
Controls/EditAtPlace.title: Controller for editing of input fields.

toolbarVisibility.title: Determines whether buttons 'Save' and 'Cancel' should be displayed.

enum.withBackground: Background will be shown while editing.

editWhenFirstRendered.title: Determines whether editing should start on first render.

content.title: Template that will be used for editing.
